author: Christian Zibreg
title: Kuo: 2018 iPad Pros to ditch Lightning in favor of USB-C, bundle with 18W fast charge adapter
description: A revered Apple analysts says that refreshed iPad Pro models for 2018 will replace the proprietary Lightning connector with the USB-C standard, speeding up charging and data transfer.
content: Introduced in September 2012 to replace the aging 30-pin dock connector, Apple’s proprietary Lightning port featured on iOS devices might be replaced on this year’s iPad Pro models in favor of USB-C, the latest industry standard in connectivity. That’s accord… [+1535 chars]
fileName: Kuo 2018 iPad Pros to ditch Lightning in favor of USB C bundle with 18W fast charge adapter
text: A revered Apple analysts says that refreshed iPad Pro models for 2018 will replace the proprietary Lightning connector with the USB-C standard, speeding up charging and data transfer.
